__e: Maybe I can ask Father for some rain and make it a moment.
Who knows when it will rain... or when it will turn out sunny?
You had much better go on horseback, for it seems likely to rain, and then you must stay all night.
By the way, it's gonna rain again in a couple of days.
I don't know, it's just it always seems like it starts raining right about now.
I ain't getting out there, when I know it's gonna start raining again any second.
